name: base64-decoder
title: Base64 File Decoder
description: Decode Base64 strings back to original binary files
content:
Overview

This application decodes Base64-encoded files back to their original binary format. Use this to restore files that were previously encoded using the Base64 Encoder app or any other Base64 encoding tool.

Features

  • Decode Base64 files to original format
  • Automatic file extension handling (.b64 removal)
  • No external dependencies required (uses Python stdlib)
  • Size calculation and comparison

Parameters

  • Input File: Upload the Base64-encoded file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for decoded file

Output

The application generates the decoded binary file. If the input file has a .b64 extension, it will be removed from the output filename.

Use Cases

  • Restore files from Base64-encoded data
  • Extract embedded files from JSON or XML documents
  • Process Base64-encoded email attachments
  • Convert data URIs back to files
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$RANDOM_$$RANDOM"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/base64_decoder.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
